name: Poro Pet Project
description:
This is a game that I worked since 2017 until 2019. It never launch, so Im making it available here to be used as my portfolio. The idea is to use the "Poro", a monster from the game League of Legends, inside a virtual pet, with a bunch of minigames with references from the main game.

I worked mostly on the  Book, shield and boots minigames inside the game, and in the entire animation state machine for the poro.

PS: There ll be some bugs, because it was never finished, but most part of the game is extreme playable and polished.

All the developers were:

Me - Gustavo de Souza Silva
Luiz Guilherme Pelegrine
Guilherme de Souza Silva

The artists were:

Thiago Lopes
Victor Lopes

The animator was:
Victor Lopes

Coffee Machine Studio no longers exists, but all the images, videos and game  cannot be copied for any reason.
